scripts.deploy-dev: sam deploy -t template.yml --stack-name Dev-IC-Planning-Poker-Database-Deploy --region us-east-2 --parameter-overrides Stage=dev Tenant=ic
scripts.deploy-prod: sam deploy -t template.yml --stack-name Prod-IC-Planning-Poker-Database-Deploy --region us-east-2 --parameter-overrides Stage=prod Tenant=ic
